project_descr: Support for in-depth assessment of urban poverty in Ha Noi and Ho Chi Minh City.

outputs.output_descr: Further to the agreement reached between Ha Noi and Ho Chi Minh Cities People’s Committees on UNDP’s support for conducting an Urban Poverty Survey in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh Cities, a Detailed Project Outline (DPO) for the UNDP-supported Project “Support for In-depth assessment of urban poverty in Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City” has been developed by the partners in close cooperation with General Statistics Office (GSO) and other associates (Viet Nam Academy of Social Sciences (VASS)/Centre for Analysis and Forecasting (CAF) and Ho Chi Minh City Institute for Development Studies (HIDS)). donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
